original_text:
Makir took a wife from among the Huppites and Shuppites. His sister’s name was Maakah.
Another descendant was named Zelophehad, who had only daughters.
korean_text: 마길은 ?빔과 숩빔의 누이 마아가라 하는 이에게 장가 들었더라 므낫세의 둘째 아들의 이름은 슬로브핫이니 슬로브핫은 딸들만 낳았으며

sentences.original_text: Makir took a wife from among the Huppites and Shuppites
sentences.korean_translation: 마길이 훕 족속과 숩 족속 중에서 아내를 맞이하였다
